scripts.api:lint: clear && WK_DIR="$(pwd)" && echo $WK_DIR && cd "$WK_DIR/apps/api/" && golangci-lint run  && cd "$WK_DIR/apps/api/internal" && golangci-lint run
scripts.api:tidy: WK_DIR="$(pwd)" && echo $WK_DIR && cd "$WK_DIR/apps/api/" && go mod tidy  && cd "$WK_DIR/apps/api/internal" && go mod tidy
scripts.docs:gen: clear && rm ./apps/api/public/index.html && redocly bundle --dereferenced --output ./assets/docs/openapi-deref.yaml ./assets/docs/openapi-ref.yaml   &&   npx @redocly/cli build-docs  ./assets/docs/openapi-deref.yaml --title Listah --output ./apps/api/public/index.html
